description: Try our easy to follow Heart Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Heart Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process biscuits in a small food processor until finely crumbed. Add butter and process until combined. Divide mixture evenly between 2 heart-shaped spring form tins. Press firmly over bases and put in the fridge.

Meanwhile, dissolve gelatine in 1 tbs boiling water. Cool slightly. In a clean processor bowl, put in cream cheese, yoghurt, icing sugar, gelatine, food colouring (optional) and process until combined.
Pour each over set base and return to the fridge for 1-2 hours or until set.
To serve, remove cheesecakes from tins and transfer to plates.
